name: Jethro's Puppy Adventure - Demo
description:
This is a simple platformer, featuring my very own dog, Jethro. Take control of Jethro to run, jump and dig all the way to his doghouse, collecting as many doggie biscuits as possible along the way.

This demo version has 3 levels playable, representing beginners, intermediate and hard difficulties.

Controls:
Arrow keys - move left, right and jump
Hold Down Arrow and Space - Dig

Mobile and gamepad support are currently experimental! Although implemented in this version, I cannot guarantee they will work as intended.
